page.title: 13RELIGION IN OWERMOIGNE
page.content: OUR SURVEY RESULTS SHOW{2/3}OF THE INHABITANTS ATTEND OUR{C OF E}CHURCH, ONLY A FEW OF THEM BEING REGULAR, ONE {BUDDHIST}AND ONE{R.C.}OWERMOIGNE HAS HAD A LIVING SINCE{1291}WITH RECTORS SINCE{1333.ST.MICHAEL'S CHURCH TOWER } {AND BELLS ARE ELIZABETHAN}BUT REVEREND {JOHN CREE'S WILL IN 1882}PAID LARGELY FOR THE REBUILDING.ITS REGISTERS FROM {1596}ARE THE BEST KEPT IN THE DIOCESE OF SALISBURY AND LIST SEVERAL ANCESTORS OF{THOMAS HARDY.}MOST OF THE CONGREGATION ARE ELDERLY AND LOCAL. THE CHURCH RUNS A{LARGE SUNDAY SCHOOL} {AND YOUTH CLUB.}IT{WELCOMES}PEOPLE TO THE VILLAGE,PRAYS FOR THE PARISHIONERS AND THE SICK AND{RAISES MONEY FOR} {CHARITY.}THE RECTOR HAS A JOINT BENEFICE OF{FIVE CHURCHES.}THERE IS A {GOSPEL HALL}WHICH NO LONGER HOLDS SERVICES.
